title: For Trade: T206 Cy Young (glove shows) Sovereign 350 PSA 2
author: AndrewJerome

posts.post_title: For Trade: T206 Cy Young (glove shows) Sovereign 350 PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Would like to trade my T206 Cy Young (glove shows) Sovereign 350 PSA 2 for a T206 Cy Young (green portrait).  PSA preferred, but I'm also open to SGC or ungraded.

Thanks for looking!

Andrew
